Articles.Content:
Quick Challenge: Using a "horrible IVA craft" (KV-1 to 3 or Mk1 capsule), send Kerbalnauts to the Mun, pilot through only IVA and KER. Land them safely, then take them back to Kerbin safely.

As this is first iteration of this challenge, I just want to see how many can pull this off. (Unfortunately a certain team IRL didn't).

 

Edited April 12, 2019 by Jestersage
